bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: Can not load audio, in non-minimal package
bug.description: Calling tc.load_audio, results in the following error message being printed for each file that it should load: Could not read <FILENAME>: module 'scipy' has no attribute 'io' Where <FILENAME> is the filename. The return SFrame is empty. It looks like this was broken by the fix for <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/3195>#3195</denchmark-link> .
